item.description: Meet at the south end of the stadium, which is just off Rocky Hill Road in Amherst. After work/before supper, late afternoon low key stroll and romp in the fields. Spend some time in the fresh air before sunset and work up an appetite for supper. Let's walk the circular track and/or have some playtime with our furry companions in the fields (which may be muddy!!) There's lots of room in the fields to run, chase and play! Heavy rain cancels; but we dont' mind a bit of drizzle. Hopefully the weather will cooperate. See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Near mini-Stonehenge, with a white PT cruiser and black lab with a blue leash

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Stadium Stroll, UMass, Amherst
